headline: CHIPOTLE MEXICAN GRILL TO ANNOUNCE FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2024 RESULTS ON FEBRUARY 4, 2025
summary: Chipotle Mexican Grill (NYSE: CMG) will host a conference call on Tuesday, February 4, 2025 at 4:30 PM Eastern time to discuss fourth quarter and full year 2024 financial results and provide a business update for the 2025 first quarter to date.
